menu.first_welcome:
Hi {{first_name}}. I am Smart Documents Bot. I can extract 'English' text from an image.
Also, I can summarize or translate the text; and generate audio the text or the the translation.
menu.first_welcome2:
Lastly, I can provide resources to learn more about the scanned topics.
To start, Please choose from below:
menu.back_to_bot: You are back to the main Bot!
menu.cannot_recognize: Sorry, we cannot recognize '{{text}}'. Here is the main menu!
menu.will_notify:
We will notify you in the future when we have any updates!
Also, we will notify you before the end of the month to save your files!
menu.when_prompted: You can send attachments only when the App ask!
menu.not_good: We did not catch this file! Please try again and make sure it is an image and it contain 'English' text!
menu.one_file: You can send only 'One Image'. Please send 'ONE' Image!
menu.no_balance: You have used all of your points. Pease wait till next month!
menu.no_jpg: We can extract text from 'JPG' images only. Please send a 'JPG' image file!
menu.scans: You have scanned '{{image_count}}' images so far. You still have '{{textract_limit}}' scans for this month!
menu.learn: You still have '{{learn_more_limit}}' Learn More points for this month!
menu.files: Please select a category from below!!

get_started.first_welcome:
Welcome to the Smart Place that is designed to help you with many tasks and make your life much easier!
We use Artificial Intelligence to extract 'English' Text from images, then we do a lot with the generated text!!
get_started.second_welcome:
You will have a balance and a pesonal storage which is totally private. The storage and the balance 'Reset Every Month', so please use the points wisely!!
Also, click 'Notify Me', and we will remind you before we delete the files by the end of the month or if we released New Apps!!

image-to-text.instruction:
Then, you will have some nice options for the generated text.
To start please send an image with 'English' Text!
image-to-text.first_intro: I am Smart Documents Bot. You can send me an image and I will extract the text from it!
